# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $10,000 to you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire such a high-value item at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
